idea:
It's an e-commerce platform which facilitates the interaction between a business opportunity and aspiring entrepreneurs in Efficient, Effective and Unbiased way to create a Win -Win model


Idea and inspiration- challenges that comes into the fore front of the 21st century - the economy uncertainty, Global financial crises , job apprehension, pandemic etc all pointed towards one thing ie.


Only entrepreneurs can turn challenges into opportunities....and bring about changes that will takes us to a more sustainable and equitable era by 2030


Business Mela- is a one stop solution for all prospective entrepreneurs and all businesses opportunity

*It will aid exploring all relevant opportunities- across investment levels, accross industries, etc

*A perfect product fit

*Pan India base

*Local language assistance

*Successful stories to learn to explore

*Guidance from the scratch



VISION:.  To create a culture/religion called entrepreneurship!!!
name: Business mela

idea: JAZBA FUELS LLP is involved in manufacturing, trading of specialized solvents. We have expertise in organizing a range of premium quality chemicals. We continued to innovate to help customers develop different products, stay ahead of changing environmental regulations, maintain low cost to serve and compete in a fast-changing business environment. Our vision is to achieve and develop Eco Friendly, Biodegradable and value added quality products at globally competitive prices using eco-friendly processes and technologies. JAZBA FUELS LLP has been providing solvents for customers for more than years so have the ability of a computing process to be used or produced in a range of capabilities.
name: JAZBA FUELS LLP

idea: You can place your order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter. A.M RISING ENERGY LLP is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel. When everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel. This will helps to generate the employment opportunity and creates the job opportunity. We will also serve to various industries such as Construction Sites, Manufacturing & Mining Industries, Hotels, Hospitals, Schools, Automobile Industry, Earth Moving Equipment’s & Gensets, etc. Doorstep delivery of fuel like diesel/ petrol is safe.
name: A.M RISING ENERGY LLP

idea:
Cococart Ventures Private Limited (“the company”), incorporated in September 2020, in the state of Maharashtra. The company established as a first of its kind premium confectionery and gourmet retailer with the widest range of imported chocolates in the country and the business operation has already operationalized since July 2020 under 3 business verticals as below:

 Online (E-channel): Website launched from 20th July 2020 and currently serve in 6 cities Mumbai, Bangalore, Delhi NCR, Kolkata, Chennai and Ahmedabad.

 B2B: The company has engaged with Natures Basket, Modern Bazar, Needs Supermarket, Le Marche, Reliance Smart, Spencers and several other stores/distributors for deriving revenue from B2B segment.

 Retail outlets: The company has established stores at various locations currently such as:

 Mumbai (2) – Cafetoria at Fort and at JW Marriott Sahar

 Bangalore (3) – High-street stores

 Kolkata (2) – Kolkata Airport and Quest Mall

 Delhi (1) – Ambience Mall, Gurgaon.

 Lucknow (1) – Kucknow Airport

 Ahmedabad (1) – Ahmedabad Airport

The company is promoted by Ahuja family. The company has a dedicated team of personnel to run the daily operations of the company. There are two directors on the board of the company viz. Mr. Karan Ahuja and Mrs. Ayesha Arjun Ahuha.

Key Highlights of the company

 The company’s promoters have accrued over two decades of business experience and possess deep understanding of the Indian market and confectionery & gourmet retail industry experience.

 The business operation has already begun under 3 business verticals and the sales through all three models have ramped up.

 With the decades of retail experience, the robust support of logistics and IT and a well-seasoned, passionate team, the company believes to develop and dominate the retail and distribution of confectionery in the domestic as well as travel retail market.

 The objective is making confectionery an E-commerce essential and setting the industry standard in the transportation of confectionery both to their warehouses and to their customers residences, will help propel success and ring-fence the business.

 Cococart's product bouquet is unique with multiple brands catering to different customer segments.

 The company has achieved revenue of Rs 18 crore and reported profit in a short span of 8 months period up to February 21 in FY21.
name: COCOCART VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Fun! is an ed-tech startup for kids. It focuses on making kid's foundation strong and makes them ready for the real world. 

It focuses on skill-building and enhancing their creativity!

Kids are the future of the country. Fun! is here to make learning fun!
name: Fun!

idea: AMBARISH GOENKA FUEL ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED is an innovative company involving in the Doorstep Diesel Delivery. Our vision is to achieve and develop Eco Friendly, Biodegradable and value added quality products at globally competitive prices using eco-friendly processes and technologies. We are venturing into the business of Mobile Fuel Dispenser to delivery Diesel (HSD) to Businesses which follow traditional ways of fueling their machinery. The concept of door step diesel delivery is novel in our area of business and will help us generate employment. We will hire trained drivers, operators, admin, security staff to run the business. We envision to create at least 20-25 jobs in the first tow years of setup. It is involved in manufacturing, trading of specialized solvents. We have expertise in organizing a range of premium quality chemicals.
name: AMBARISH GOENKA FUEL ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: VENCER PAINTS & ADHESIVES Private limited is a women Entrepreneur Company where 63% of the major stake is controlled by women. VENCER PAINTS & ADHESIVES Private limited is formed to manufacture water based paints, adhesives & water proofing solutions using process which are not just innovative but also environmental friendly. We also use technology that help contribute in a small way to the aspiration of the Indian Government to become ATHMA NIRBAR BHARAT.
name: VENCER PAINTS & ADHESIVES PRIVATE LIMITED
